channel.title: +Cochran Gregory on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in +Cochran Gregory on Vishvas's notes

item.title: Bad custom
item.description: Sometimes people opt to copy really stupid customs that originated in their upper class. Foot-binding. In Roman Egypt (Faiyum), sibling marriage was pretty common in the general population.

item.title: Immigrants
item.description:
Representativeness

More often than not, immigration flows are broadly representative of the population they originate from, but not always.

In the Irish potato famine, the poorest starved to death, those in trouble but with some assets bought passage to the US, comfortable people stayed home. Roughly speaking. The point being that the Irish moving to the US were not wildly unrepresentative - not just the dregs, not an elite either.

item.title: Stupid many
item.description:
Kaprun

On November 11, 2000, a train in a tunnel in Austria caught fire.

12 people broke a window and escaped downward along a narrow catwalk.

Many more tried to escape upward , but heat and smoke also went upward. They all died.
